      • checkFlush

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> checkFlush​(char type,
                                                         int cap)
        Verifies if there is a Flush in the hand
        Parameters:
        type - N if the its the normal flush, or H if it is needed checking on the number of High Cards
        cap - number of cards of this groups, 5,4 or 3, or the number of High cards needed checking
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all the indexes of the cards that are supposed to be hold, null if there is not a flush in the hand

                                                             int value2,
                                                             char type)
        Verifies if there are two specific cards, suited or unsuited, in the hand
        Parameters:
        value1 - first value wanted to be checked
        value2 - second value wanted to be checked
        type - to know if it is wanted to check suited or unsuited cards
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all the indexes of the cards that are supposed to be hold, null if there is not two specific cards suited or unsuited in the hand

      • classify

        public int classify()
        If the hand is a royal flush, return 1. If the hand is a straight flush, return 2. If the hand is four of a kind, return 3 if the four of a kind is aces, 4 if the four of a kind is 2-4, and 5 if the four of a kind is 5-K. If the hand is a full house, return 6. If the hand is a flush, return 7. If the hand is a straight, return 8. If the hand is three of a kind, return 9. If the hand is two pair, return 10. If the hand is a high pair, return 11. If the hand is none of the above, return 12
        Returns:
        The classification of the hand.
